title: Canadian Engineering Competition
details: The annual Gathering of the very best and brightest engineering students across Canada! Through seven competitions, students will be challenged in the fields of innovation, design, and communications

title: Canadian Engineering leadership conference
details: The annual general meeting of the CFES and a platform for student collaboration with industry partners, sponsors and fellow students

title: Conference on sustainability in engineering
details: CSE aims to raise awareness about issues in sustainability and environmental engineering, and encourage students to discuss and design solutions to counter them

title: Conference on Diversity in Engineering
details: CDE aims to develop knowledge surrounding the variety of individuals, cultures and perspectives found within engineering communities

title: President's meeting
details: This conference is a meeting called by the CFES President, between executive representatives of all member schools and the CFES officers.

title: National Engineering Month
details: Every year during the month of March throughout the country, Canada celebrates engineering excellence with 500+ events across the nation, showcasing the rewarding and impactful nature of engineering as a profession

title: BEST Courses
details: Complementary education courses all across Europe provided by our partner the Board of European Students of Technology
